name: OkayGo
description:
OkayGo is a third person 3D game with 2 missions.  In the first mission, you must gather your two swords in a Runner game mode.  In the 2nd Mission, you must save the two innocent people, an Old Man and his Grandaughter, from the two Robbers!

I have 3D modeled all the art and modified Mixamo animations for use.  Everything for this project was made during the Game Jam time.  No scripts or models were used from any previous projects.

I am a beginner game dev! Have not shared a game project with anyone and am definitely nervous about this upload!  Be kind :)

Oh yeah, the theme of the Game Jam was Two..

Made in Unreal Engine (File size is 140mb, Game is 415mb)
